Here we've changed our tabs module to a dynamic configuration from a static one. We've also gone ahead and used the recommended "template" param.

Specifically, we use a search that will basically create us 4 rows: Sourcetypes, Sources, Indexes and Hosts. We also create different fields for values ("per_sourcetype_thruput") as opposed to the labels ("Sourcetype").

module.name: Search
module.param: index=_internal source="*metrics.log" group="per_*_thruput" | dedup group | sort group | fields group | eval label=case(group="per_sourcetype_thruput","Sourcetypes",group="per_index_thruput", "Indexes", group="per_source_thruput", "Sources", group="per_host_thruput", "Hosts")

module.name: Search
module.param: index=_internal source="*metrics.log" $group$ | stats min(eps) avg(eps) max(eps) by series
